text: (He yahudi ra isa'i!) Ke timi yo bhandachau ki ibrahima, isma'ila, is'haka, ya'akuba ra tinaka santati yahudi va isa'i thi'e? (He muham'mada! Tiniharusita) bhanidinus, ke timiharu dherai jnani chaum, ki allaha? Allahako najika pramana luka'une bhanda badhi an'yayi ko huna sakdacha? Ra timiharu je garirakheka chau, tyasasita allaha asavadhana chaina
